coreAtributes.authorTag: The clothing's tag reads: 'Created by TonyJC, with implementation and editing by NeverLucky'
coreAtributes.name: shoulderless sweater
coreAtributes.description: A cosy yet seductive sweater that exposes the wearer's shoulders.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the woolly sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso, the wide collar allowing [npc.her] bare shoulders to lie free.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms into the woolly sewn sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso!

displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the woolly sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso, the wide collar allowing [npc.her] bare shoulders to lie free.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms into the woolly sewn sweater's sleeves as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso!

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] shoulderless sweater back down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] sweater back down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] bare-shoulder sweater, revealing [npc.her] revealing [npc.her] chest.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] bare-shoulder sweater, revealing [npc.her] revealing [npc.her] chest.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] bare-shoulder sweater back up, concealing [npc.her] chest.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] bare-shoulder sweater back up, concealing [npc.her] chest.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] bare-shoulder sweater back up over [npc2.her] chest.
